name: Endless Endall
description:
Endless Endall is a hard as balls platformer with controls so precise that you'll feel weird playing any other game afterwards. Prepare to die hundreds of times on a single level, but don't worry, you respawn in 1/60th of a second. Basically a single frame. Play as 15 characters with different abilities, levels, and stories (Except there's only 4 because the games still in development) and then play as over 100 bonus characters (That's also being worked on)

Just play it, you can delete it later!

Download the controller version of the game (It's way better)

(Some stuff might change in later versions and actual release)
